    hscheel

    • Method Detail

      • control

        public double control(double inputSignal)
        Calculates an output signal for the rudder, based on the current position and the goal.
        Parameters:
        inputSignal - the position of the rudder, that it should be set to finally
        Returns:
        the position of the the rudder to set (calculated value + current position)
